flavorText:
"We can't control enemies who have no regard for their own survival."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir können keine Feinde kontrollieren, die keinen Wert auf ihr eigenes Überleben legen." —Eintreiberin Lavinia, Zehntes Revier
foreignData.name: Fest der Verwüstung
foreignData.text:
Spieler können keine Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten.
Zu Beginn des Versorgungssegments jedes Spielers verliert dieser Spieler die Hälfte (aufgerundet) seiner Lebenspunkte.

foreignData.flavorText: "No podemos controlar a enemigos que no sienten aprecio alguno por su propia supervivencia." —Encarceladora Lavinia, distrito décimo
foreignData.name: Festival de devastación
foreignData.text:
Los jugadores no pueden ganar vidas.
Al comienzo del mantenimiento de cada jugador, ese jugador pierde la mitad de sus vidas, redondeando hacia arriba.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il est impossible de contrôler des ennemis qui n'ont aucun égard pour leur propre survie. » —Courtière Lavinia, Dixième circonscription
foreignData.name: Festival du Ravage
foreignData.text:
Les joueurs ne peuvent pas gagner de points de vie.
Au début de l'entretien de chaque joueur, ce joueur perd la moitié de ses points de vie, arrondie à l'unité supérieure.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non possiamo controllare nemici a cui non interessa sopravvivere." —Lavinia, polizia del Decimo Distretto
foreignData.name: Festival della Devastazione
foreignData.text:
I giocatori non possono guadagnare punti vita.
All'inizio del mantenimento di ogni giocatore, quel giocatore perde la metà dei suoi punti vita, arrotondati per eccesso.

foreignData.flavorText: 「自分の命なんかどうでもいいっていう敵は手に負えないわね。」 ――第10管区の拘引者、ラヴィニア
foreignData.name: 騒乱の大祭
foreignData.text:
プレイヤーはライフを得られない。
各プレイヤーのアップキープの開始時に、そのプレイヤーは自分のライフの端数を切り上げた半分を失う。

foreignData.flavorText: "죽는 것을 두려워하지 않는 적을 통제하는 건 불가능하다." —10번 관할지역 체포원 라비니아
foreignData.name: 대혼란의 축제
foreignData.text:
플레이어들은 생명점을 얻을 수 없다.
각 플레이어의 유지단 시작에, 그 플레이어는 자신의 생명의 절반을 올림한 만큼의 생명점을 잃는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Não podemos controlar inimigos que não se importam com a própria sobrevivência." — Encarceradora Lavinia, Décima Jurisdição
foreignData.name: Festival da Devastação
foreignData.text:
Os jogadores não podem ganhar pontos de vida.
No início da manutenção de cada jogador, aquele jogador perde metade de seus pontos de vida, arredondada para cima.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мы не можем контролировать врага, которому безразлично, выживет он или нет». — Задержатель Лавиния, Десятый Округ
foreignData.name: Праздник Опустошения
foreignData.text:
Игроки не могут получать жизни.
В начале шага поддержки каждого игрока, тот игрок теряет половину своих жизней, округленную в большую сторону.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我们无法掌握不在乎自身安危的敌人。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉温妮
foreignData.name: 劫难节庆
foreignData.text:
牌手不能获得生命。
在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手失去一半生命，小数点后进位。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我們無法掌握不在乎自身安危的敵人。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉溫妮
foreignData.name: 劫難節慶
foreignData.text:
玩家不能獲得生命。
在每位玩家的維持開始時，該玩家失去一半生命，小數點後進位。

name: Havoc Festival
originalText:
Players can't gain life.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses half his or her life, rounded up.

rulings.text: Spells and abilities that would cause a player to gain life still resolve, but the life-gain part has no effect.
Effects that would replace gaining life with another effect won’t apply because it’s impossible for players to gain life.

If an effect says to set a player’s life total to a certain number and that number is higher than the player’s current life total, that part of the effect won’t do anything. (If the number is lower than the player’s current life total, the effect will work as normal.)

The amount of life lost is calculated when the triggered ability resolves. For example, if a player has 20 life and there are two Havoc Festivals on the battlefield, the first ability will cause that player to lose 10 life and then the second ability will cause that player to lose 5 life.

In a Two-Headed Giant game, the last ability triggers for each player. Any life loss is applied to the team’s life total. For example, if the team has 30 life, the first ability will cause the player (and thus the team) to lose 15 life and then the second ability will cause the other player (and thus the team) to lose 8 life. The team will end up having 7 life.

text:
Players can't gain life.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses half their life, rounded up.
